Trinity/Nightlight::

"Who're they, Uncle Aerotaur????"said Trinity while she moved close 
to Aerotaur "Are they a nice bots????"

Nightlight wasn't sure what was going on, but she sat down near to 
Aerotaur and didn't said anything.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur/Pyrotaur::
>        Aerotaur sits down facing Pyrotaur.  "So what do you have to 
tell me?"
> 
>        Pyrotaur sits up.  "You are our leader."  He keeps talking, 
cutting 
> off Aerotaur's question.  "You are Aerotaur.  You were damaged b 
our former 
> leader after an accident where we tried to make him more 
aggressive.  He shot 
> you into space.  You crashed here.  We followed you, as did he.  He 
is 
> somewhere in this area."  He points to the Mediterranean on a 
map.  "We need 
> your help so that we can fix him and become a gestalt again."
